snippet: "Don't Sleep With T.J. Holmes" is set to compete in the fall with the likes of "The Daily Show," "Chelsea Lately" and "Conan," offering a "unique and smart African-American filter."
abstract: "Don't Sleep With T.J. Holmes" is set to compete in the fall with the likes of "The Daily Show," "Chelsea Lately" and "Conan," offering a "unique and smart African-American filter."

headline.main: BET Plans a Late-Night Satirical News Show
headline.print_headline: BET Show Will Offer News and Commentary
